readable.title: 494329594_6e751372a0
readable.content: A black woman in a pink bikini is sitting on a towel on a lounge chair . A girl with hot pink toe nails and bathing suit is laying on a hot pink towel . A woman in a pink bikini is laying on a deck lounge chair that is covered with a pink towel . There is a very oiled darker woman on a pink towel , lounging on a lawn chair next to her flip flops and suntan lotion . Woman in pink is suntanning
